content: This is complete fiction. Most of those losing “insurance” under Trumpcare would be losinf Medicaid. Studies have shown that there is literally no difference between not having insurance and having Medicaid. Despite the fact that it is the number one or number two expense item in every state in the union. If a program shows no difference for those who are on it why continue it at all? Democrats not only continued it but acted like they were saving the country by expanding it. Why peddle this fiction that people will die without it?
